did.unittitle: Rebecca Conkling Shelton correspondence with O.B. Ackerley
did.abstract: This collection contains correspondence between Rebecca Conkling Shelton and O.B. Ackerley concerning Shelton's late husband, the Reverend Frederick William Shelton, and the acquisition of a collection of his sermons. The collection also includes a list of Frederick William Shelton's Works" and a eulogy.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1990.
